lamparski.areabase.fragments

Class SummaryFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • lamparski.areabase.fragments.SummaryFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAreabaseFragment, AreaDataService.BasicAreaInfoIface, OnError

    public class SummaryFragment
extends Fragment
implements IAreabaseFragment, AreaDataService.BasicAreaInfoIface
    The lovely Summary Fragment. Displays the map of the area, and cards with information relating to the area. It uses state-of-the-art adaptive Mad Libs generation technology to deliver human-readable descriptions for even the most confusing statistical data... or, you know, might just crash horribly. In this case, one should report bugs. no but really this is what the user sees first so it should be good.
    Author:
    filip
    See Also:
    IAreabaseFragment, AreaActivity

        public void refreshContent()
        Description copied from interface: IAreabaseFragment
        On fragments that support it, refresh the current content. Called when the user selects the "Refresh" action on the parent AreaActivity.
